reviews.review: I mean its pog and its worth the money for sure

There once was a ship that put to sea
The name of the ship was the Billy of Tea
The winds blew up, her bow dipped down
Oh blow, my bully boys, blow (huh)
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day, when the tonguing is done
We'll take our leave and go
She'd not been two weeks from shore
When down on her a right whale bore
The captain called all hands and swore
He'd take that whale in tow (huh)
Soon may the Wellerman come
To bring us sugar and tea and rum
One day, when the tonguing is done
We'll take our leave and go
Da-da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da-da
Da-da-da-da-da-da-da-da-da-da-da
Before the boat had hit the water
The whale's tail came up and caught her
All hands to the side, harpooned and fought her
When she dived down low (huh)…
Наконец-то у меня дошли до неё руки чтобы купить халву, теперь буду проходить часами, ломать голову и т. д. В общем советую

El mejor y mas trascendente juego de la historia. Consigue hacer todo lo que se propone y sigue siendo disfrutable para cualquiera casi 20 años después. Haganse el favor de jugarlo, si no los atrapa la jugabilidad, los va a atrapar la historia y el universo creado, o viceversa.
it's hal life 2. What else do you need to know?

OVERWHELMINGLY YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS this game is one of the best games ever made in my opinion i love this game and although i dont have very much time in it i think it is easily top 10 best video games ever made th egameplay is fun the graphics are so good for 2004 and it just took everything that was good about the first game and made it better in my opinion OVERWHELMINGLY 100% EXXCEELEENT GAM and hopefully my first of many

Alright, now I understand what all the hype is about.

Half Life 2 is a great sequel, I would consider it's first half to be perfection. Once you get to the prison section, every mission after that is worse in quality. The prison mission was pretty damn boring, with you waiting for the next wave of soldiers to spawn like 20 times. I don't understand how mission like that can end up in a game with a mission like Ravenholm, which might be one of the best levels I have ever seen, top tier quality right there. I had no other issues with the game, everything except for the last few mission was amazing (they weren't bad, just not as good as the other ones). 
8,5/10

Half Life 2 Episode 1 has great pacing and some excellent moments, mainly the part where you have to wait for an elevator in a pitch dark room. For some reason tho, subtitles weren't showing up. In my opinion, this was better than the base game.
9/10

Half Life 2 Episode 2 was somehow even better than the first episode. Again, tons of memorable moments, never felt bored.
10/10

Overall, Half Life 2 is a masterpiece, it puts modern games to shame. If you haven't bought it already, do yourself a favor and whip out your wallet, you won't regret it.

Overall 9,5/10
优化特别的好，细节也十分到位，虽然画面现在看来有点差，但游玩起来真的爽
Sisteminiz iyi değilse saran orta fiyatlı bir oyun istiyosanız aradığınız oyun bu tek kelimeyle efsane
You know what they say, the right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
Probablemente el mejor single-player que jugué en mi vida.

Efsanevi Half-Life serisinin devam oyunu. Hikayeye eklenen yeni karakterler ile aksiyon hat safhada. Source oyun motorunun bize sunduğu obje hareket ettirmenin de yardımı ile gerçekten kafa yorabilecek bulmacalara sahip. Özellikle herhangi bir sinematik sahnenin olmaması, karakterimiz Gordon Freeman'ın konuşmaması sizi gerçekten oyunun içinde hissettiriyor. Fiyatı uygun fakat indirimi bekleyebilirsiniz. Yaz indirimleri ile birlikte Valve Complete Pack alıp birinci oyunu oynamadıysanız oynayabilirsiniz.. İyi eğlenceler

oyun bir kere optimazyonu çok iyi 2.husus A.I konusunda iyi ama (ultra güzel değil bi wolfenstain değil) ayrıca oyun hikayesi kendini belli ediyor ve gerçekten de ona göre ilerliyor source motoru ise tıpkı şimdiki oyunlarının o zamanki versiyonu olmuş ben çok beğendim. Güzel bir oyun hele ki halen almadıysanız indirimdeyken kaçırmayın derim benden söylemesi
Vuruş hissinin oldukça iyi olduğunu söyleyebilirim Half Life evrenine uzak olan beni bile içine çekti Eski bir oyun olmasına rağmen eski hissettirmiyor Hala oynanır vaziyette
fun, it scared me like 200 times
Отличная игра, которая будет актуальна в любое время!
3 и 3 наиграних часов. Гейб гони халфу с пятерочки
Game's pretty good so far but I haven't found any tomato soup cans I can throw at people. 0/10
Une très bonne jouabilité sur mon pc portable de 2016.

Всё своё существование избегал Half-Life.
Серьёзно, я считал, что эта игра переоценена, да и мне не нравятся такого жанра игры. Я не понимал, как игра 2004 года, да ещё и SP будет такой популярной, всеми любимой. Пока не поиграл в неё лично.
Привычная физика Source движка. Те самые звуки выстрелов, взрывов и т.п. Та самая порой пугающая тишина этого огромного мира. А ведь он реально огромный и разнообразный.
Нет особо таких головоломок, что хочется рвать волосы с головы, но приятно проходить "средней" сложности задачи.
Приятная стрельба и разнообразие оружия.
Порой сложные NPC.
Приятный эмбиент и совсем не противная графика.
Я теперь действительно "жду" 3 часть, жаль в Alyx нет возможности поиграть.
Игра хороша тогда, когда её хочется перепройти, а эта одна из них.

If you loved the original Half Life then this is just as good for a sequel set many years after the 1st Half life even if your new to gaming or got a working gaming computer defiantly a top recommended game .
Polecam wybrać się na wakacje do RavenHolm :)
Oh my days is it wonderful. The story is so well written, and the gameplay is so fun. 10,000/10
Te trae recuerdos de cuando eras niño y jugabas con tus amigos, sin duda, algo digno de recordar.

El juego es divertido, llega a ser complicado cuando te rodean muchos enemigos y te queda poca munición, solo tiene 2 cinemáticas, la banda sonora es buena.
 Se puede jugar en una laptop, lo que me sorprendió la primera vez que lo jugué. 
Si tuviera que decir algo malo sería el doblaje a español, recomiendo jugarlo en ingles con subtítulado, ya que algunas voces suenan horribles. El juego es del 2004 y se ve espectacular.

Half Life 2 es de los mejores juegos de la saga en cuanto a graficos(para la epoca) una calidad excepcional en el sonido y soundtrack, Aunque el mejor aspecto en el que destaca y siempre lo hace Half Life, es la historia siendo una o la mejor en juegos de disparos. Compralo al momento de esta reseña esta barato ;)
possibly one of the best pc games of all time

Игра заслуженно считается шедевром, интересный сюжет и не менее интересный геймплей способны затянуть надолго. Персонажи запоминаются и к ним привязываешься. Графика тоже хороша, даже на сегодняшний день.
Проще говоря. я не зря потратил свои время и деньги.
Игра хороша тем что убивает время реально интересно игра стоит своих денег) эх Half-life ты всегда будешь в моем сердце игра которая стала эволюцией
Good story i play it and i enjoy it

Oynadığım en iyi oyunlardan biri kesinlikle, film gibi akıyor oynamayan varsa direkt alsın, zaten tüm seri indirim zamanları paket halinde ve çok ucuz oluyor. 

Half life 2 aslında 3 oyun; half life 2, hl2 ep 1, hl2 ep 2 olarak. Hepsini almanız daha iyi olur. İlk oyunu da oynamak isterseniz Half life ya da black mesa almanız gerek. Half life orijinal ilk oyun black mesa ise half life oyununun hl2 grafik motoruyla tekrar yapılmış hali. Grafikleri daha iyi hale getirdiklerinden olsa gerek sınır dünyası kısımlarına ekstra bölümler eklemişler bunun haricinde orijinal oyunla aynı, ilk oyunu oynamak isterseniz bakabilirsiniz.
